summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing modification of plans, specifications and cost estimates prepared pursuant to Ordinance 103266 for the Northwest Market Street Project in the Arterial wire undergrounding program to provide for installation of lighting standards of such additional strength as may be required to support overhead wiring for trackless trolley service, providing for reimbursement of additional costs by the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund in such connection.
